profile: As an experienced Analyst QA Engineer/Lead Quality Engineer, I specialize in enhancing software quality and efficiency through innovative testing strategies and robust automation frameworks. My technical expertise spans JAVA, Cucumber, JMeter, Postman, Git, and Jenkins Pipelines, enabling me to deliver high-quality solutions across diverse project environments.
title: Cloud Test Engineer
